message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DB, cs.AI. 

The paper focuses on Point-of-Interest (POI) recommendation using Location-based Social Networks (LBSNs), which involves learning users' preferences and mobility patterns. This falls under the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. The paper also proposes a spatio-temporal activity-centers algorithm to model users' behavior more accurately, which involves data modeling and analysis, falling under the Databases (cs.DB) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper incorporates matrix factorization to improve POI recommendation, which is a common technique in recommender systems, and thus falls under the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category.
